#summary How to get in touch with the developers
#labels Featured

= Mailing List =

This is our most common channel of communication. Just head on over to the [http://groups.google.com/group/synergy-plus mailing list] and post your question there and you'll usually get a reply within a day or so.

= IRC =

Head on over to #synergy-plus on [http://freenode.net/ irc.freenode.net:8001], and ask your question there. There's usually a developer monitoring the chat room, so you will usually get a pretty quick response.

= Twitter =

One of our developers uses twitter, so feel free to follow ([https://twitter.com/NickBoltonUK NickBoltonUK]).
